title: An advocate who offered a window on the experience of living with brain cancer dies at 43
description: Adam Hayden, a patient advocate and the subject of an earlier profile in STAT, has died at age 43.
content: Adam Hayden, a patient advocate and the subject of an earlier profile in STAT, has died at age 43.
